channel.title: [Read] Clearing out IPs and Users before releasing server(?)
channel.description:
Their should be a rule on Mopar to clear out all users (Delete all users .dat files, etc) and their IP logs and chat logs possibly.
This could make the download go faster for starters; and help keep people secure.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2009, 12:27:42 am[/size][hr]Sorry for double posting; any comments?

item.title: [Read] Clearing out IPs and Users before releasing server(?)
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Yes, because we need more rules. Next thing you know, servers can’t be based off of winterLove servers. Any server not based off of RS2D or 317 Server isn’t allowed.

But seriously, I agree on this, but it should not be a rule.

Read full topic
item.source: [Read] Clearing out IPs and Users before releasing server(?)

@vic_08 wrote:

Everyone does this already.
